name: Niku
description: Niku was a processing animation made with the HYPE framework by Joshua Davis. It is a variation of and the result of 'Volk', a project started on Skillshare (Programming Graphics II: Generative Art Animation, Processing and HYPE with Joshua Davis). Volk was adapted and renamed for an exhibtion in Antwerp. 2016 CR 849 https://hansup.be/2016_niku_animation_hans-verhaegen.html
